name: Need for Coin
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 41.

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

We selected Racing Platformer with a bit of press your luck

Built in 48 hours

Controls:

Accelerate - W
Left - A
Right - D
Brake - S
Jump - Spacebar
Pause - Esc

Models:

Low-Poly pack cars and drivers by MIXAILL
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/low-poly-pack-cars-and-drive...

Grass Road Race by SUGAR ASSET https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/grass-road-race-4...

Low Poly Item Pickups Pack by WIREFRAMEFOX https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/low-poly-item-pickups-pack-84144

Small Particle Pack by FIRE95
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/small-particle-pack-8463

Sounds:

Cars: 1.6GL (Manual) 1982 model Ford Cortina. Exterior, engine ticking over  by BBC Sound Effects
http://bbcsfx.acropolis.org.uk/

Cars: 1972 B.M.C. Mini, 1000cc engine. Exterior, door open and close 07023066 by BBC Sound Effects
http://bbcsfx.acropolis.org.uk/

Coins 1 by ProjectsU012
https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341695/

CollectCoin.wav by bradwesson
https://freesound.org/people/bradwesson/sounds/135936/

Quiet seawash, gentle close perspective waves on shingle - 1922 (1S1, reprocessed) 07053089 by BBC Sound Effects
http://bbcsfx.acropolis.org.uk/

Pueblo Village Party (ID 863) by Lobo Loco
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/COLORED_LIFE/Pueblo_Village_Party_ID...

Water, Pouring, A.wav by InspectorJ
https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/421184/
